AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: canah breeder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While most Altmer skilled with animals set their eyes on taming a gryphon, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to go for something a little smaller, and far less dangerous. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly became rather skilled at breeding canah, a colourful bird native to the Summerset Isles. [PAWN_nameDef] made quite a decent amount of coin breeding canah for nobles, who all seemed to want an aviary full of them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gryphon handler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While not personally bonded to any gryphons, [PAWN_nameDef] did help care for them. Not a particularly easy job, as a young gryphon is likely to bite off fingers, while an adult gryphon will instead bite off the whole arm.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: indrik tamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Not content with bonding with a gryphon, [PAWN_nameDef] instead set [PAWN_possessive] eyes on something else, the indrik. While highly skilled with animals, [PAWN_nameDef] would still have to find a wild indrik first, which proved nigh impossible.
